com.fs.starfarer.api.impl.campaign.intel.events

Interface HostileActivityCause2

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseHostileActivityCause2, HegemonyAICoresActivityCause, KantasProtectionPirateActivityCause2, KantasWrathPirateActivityCause2, LuddicChurchStandardActivityCause, LuddicPathAgreementHostileActivityCause2, PirateBasePirateActivityCause2, RemnantNexusActivityCause, SindrianDiktatStandardActivityCause, StandardLuddicPathActivityCause2, StandardPerseanLeagueActivityCause, StandardPirateActivityCause2, TriTachyonStandardActivityCause

    public interface HostileActivityCause2
    There can be multiple "causes" for the same type of hostile activity. For example, there may be more pirates because: 1) General pirate activity due to having a colony 2) Free port attracting more of them 3) A pirate base nearby And so on.
